name: Interdimensional Community Service
description:
After being sentenced to a year of Interdimensional Community Service for unauthorized dimension travel, John Smith is tasked with fixing dimensional anomalies caused by careless dimensional travelers... but not without the reluctant help of Gala, a sarcastic and somewhat mean AI.

If you're stuck, a walk-through can be found here: https://pastebin.com/TNkj1KMY
